title: Socialcore – Social Media Platform
description: A scalable social networking platform where users can create profiles, share photos, and chat in real time. Designed with a focus on user experience and high availability, leveraging cloud infrastructure and DevOps practices.

title: Freelenso – Freelance Services Platform
description: A secure freelance marketplace that connects clients and freelancers for project-based collaboration. Includes features like smart bidding, milestone tracking, and escrow-secured payments to ensure transparency and trust.
